meanings.definition: The quality or state of being rocky.
meanings.sent1: The rockiness of the path made it difficult to walk.
meanings.sent2: The hiker carefully navigated the rockiness of the mountain trail.
meanings.sent3: The playful puppy slipped on the rockiness of the gravel driveway.
meanings.sent4: Her voice had a certain rockiness to it, like gravel underfoot.
meanings.sent5: The rockiness of the terrain was a constant challenge for the climbers.

meanings.definition: The rough, uneven surface of rocks.
meanings.sent1: The rockiness of the boulder made it hard to climb.
meanings.sent2: The children enjoyed exploring the rockiness of the riverbed.
meanings.sent3: The wheelbarrow struggled over the rockiness of the garden path.
meanings.sent4: The rockiness of the cliff face posed a challenge for the climbers.
meanings.sent5: The rockiness of the ground made it tricky to set up the tent.
